00130                      getGroupMembershipCommandInd), \

00132                       COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00133                      removeGroupCommandInd), \
00134     DEFINE_COMMAND(removeAllGroupsCommand, ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_REMOVE_ALL_GROUPS_COMMAND_ID, \

00136                      removeAllGroupsCommandInd), \

00157 #define GROUPS_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00158 { \
00159    .id = GROUPS_CLUSTER_ID, \
00160    .options = { \
00161                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00162                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00163               }, \
00164    .attributesAmount = ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00165    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00166    .commandsAmount = ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00167    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00168 }
00169 
00170 #define GROUPS_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00171 { \
00172    .id = GROUPS_CLUSTER_ID, \
00173    .options = { \
00174                 .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00175                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00176               }, \
00177    .attributesAmount = ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00178    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00179    .commandsAmount = ZCL_GROUPS_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00180    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00181 }
00182 
00183 #define DEFINE_GROUPS_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00184     GROUPS_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
